author: andschwa
body: With the change to build instead of publish, the xUnit tests no longer run. Sadly, they also don't trigger the build to fail.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
Nope, this isn't our fault. It worked just fine with older versions of CLI, and then broke.

Tracking in dotnet/cli#2402.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: The tests will also need to be updated for OS X.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I've got it working on Linux again.

title: Fix the xUnit runner
